text: Ballyboy () is a barony in County Offaly (formerly King's County), Republic of Ireland. ==Etymology== Ballyboy barony derives its name from the village of Ballyboy (Irish Baile Átha Buí, "settlement of the yellow ford").Logainm.ie ==Location== Ballyboy barony is located in central County Offaly. The Silver River flows through it. ==List of settlements== Below is a list of settlements in Ballyboy barony: *Ballyboy *Kilcormac *Mountbolus ==References== Category:Baronies of County Offaly
title: Ballyboy (barony)
